attributes.action: ban the sale of Rat Poison to the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after the death of my family's 11 month old Springer Spaniel, which was a result of consuming Rat Poison.  I feel strongly that the sale of Rat Poison to the general public should be banned and only be allowed for use by authorised persons i.e. pest control officers etc.
